name: TDLM Title Case
author: TDLM

sections.description:
Puts a drop-down under your post title titled “Change Case,” which gives you three options:

  1. Title Case
  2. Lowercase
  3. Uppercase

Selecting any of these options will immediately change the title text you have entered according to the selected setting.

Tags

title, titlecase, title case
sections.installation:
1. Upload the tdlm-title-case folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the TDLM Title Case plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin by going to the TDLM Title Case menu that appears in your admin menu under Settings
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

Fixed missing argument warning.

1.0.0

Release Date: April 10th, 2015

Initial Release of the plugin.

short_description: Change your post title to correct title case or all lowercase or all uppercase.
description:
Puts a drop-down under your post title titled “Change Case,” which gives you three options:

Selecting any of these options will immediately change the title text you have entered according to the selected setting.

screenshots.caption: Note the new drop-down labeled "-- Change Case --" next to the View Post button.
Here, I have selected "Title Case," which changed the title case respectively.
